TELEMETRY REF AF_UNEXPECTED_ASSERT BIG_ENDIAN "An unexpected assert happened"
    <%=render "_ref_tlm_evr_hdr.txt", locals: {id: 348} %>

    APPEND_ITEM FILE_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM FILE 0 STRING "The source file of the assert"
    ITEM LINE -64 32 UINT "Line number of the assert"
    ITEM NUMARGS -32 32 UINT "Number of unexpected arguments"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Unexpected assert in file %s, line %d, args %d" , packet.read('file') , packet.read('line') , packet.read('numArgs') )
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('FATAL')
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
